title: It Is Too Little for You to Be My Servant
itunes:title: It Is Too Little for You to Be My Servant
description: I want to focus this week on the extraordinary passage from the book of the prophet Isaiah, for it reveals a central dynamic of all of biblical revelation, and indeed of the spirituality of every Christian: that the Lord’s election is not for the sake of the elect, but for the sake of the whole world.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
